thayiwanayehi kanthawo - wikipidiya, nidahas wishwakoshaya thayiwanayehi kanthawo 2016 wasarehidi thayiwanayehi janadhipathiwariya lesin theri pathwu thsayi ing-wan thayiwanayehi kanthawange thaththwaya padanam aththe saha eya matha balapam athi karanuye, thayiwana samajaya thula pawathina sampradayika pithrumulika dakim saha samajiya wyuhaya wisin wana athara, wisheshayenma pasugiya dashaka deka athulatha sanshodhana kihipayakata pawul nithiya nathu wimath ha samagama matha wasara kihipaya thula thayiwana kanthawange naithika thaththwaya wadidiyunu wimakata lak wuwada, purushayanta yatath mattamaka kanthawan pihituwayi. 1 wiwahaya saha pawul nithiya 2 aandukrama wyawasthanukula aarakshana 3 kamkaru ayithiwasikam 4 linga waraniya gabsawa wiwahaya saha pawul nithiya[sanskaranaya] thayiwanayehi tharuna kanthawan wesak uthsawayakadi thayiwana hikshuniyak (bauddha pawidi thanaththiyak) ulon the piliganwamin 20wana siyawasa purawatama, wiwahaka kanthawange ayithiwasikam wetha dadi sima panawunuda, eewa kramayen yahapath thaththwayata peralune, wisheshayenma awasan wasara 20 thuladi (1996 saha 2002 atharathura pawul nithiya pas wathawak sanshodhanaya kerini) siduwu naithika wenaskam hethuweni.[1] 1895 wasarehidi, japan palanaya yatathata thayiwanaya pathwu athara, japana wiwaha nithi (kanthawanta wenas ayurin salakima sidu kala) wyawaharayehi yedawini.[2] 1945 wasarehidi japanayehi parajayen pasuwa, ripablikanu pradhana bhumi pradeshayehi 1930 wasarehidi panawana lada siwil nithiyehi adanguwu pawul nithiya kotasa thayiwanaya thulada balathmaka keruni (komiyunist rajaya wisin pawul nithiya pasuwa wenas kerunada, ema wenasa thayiwanaya thula kriyakmaka wuye natha).[3] 1930 wasarehi thayiwana siwil nithi sangrahaya wisin thayiwana kanthawan sandaha simitha ayithiwasikam laba dun athara, owunge niwahana thiranaya kirime ayithiya nomathi bawa, thamange depola himikara ganimata nohakiyawa, dikkasada naduwak pawarimata nohakiyawa, swayan-aarakshawa nomathi bawa, daruwan athbharaya sandaha ayithiwasikam nomathi wima saha awajathaka daruwanta wenas lesa salakima yannan ema simanthikayan athara wiya.[4][5] 1985 saha 1996 wasara waladi sidu kala wenas kam nisa wiwahaka kanthawange thaththwaya mada washayen wadi diyunu wiya. 1998 wasara wana wita, nawa regulasi hethuwen dikkasadaya tharamak pahasu wu athara, aya peradi eewa sathuwa siti bawa oppu nokota 1985 ta parani nama yatathe ayage depola liyapadinchi kirimata biriyata ida salasunu athara, dikkasada naduwakadi daruwange athbharaya thiranaya kirimedi daruwange ihalama shubhasiddhiya salakimata winishchayakaruta awakasha salasini.[6]
